official_title: To provide for the sale by the Secretary of the Interior of the Sly Park Unit of the Central Valley Project to the El Dorado Irrigation District, Placerville, El Dorado County, California.

summary.text: Sly Park Unit Sale Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell the Sly Park Unit, Central Valley Project, California, to the El Dorado Irrigation District, City of Placerville, El Dorado County, California. Describes the Sly Park Unit as including the Sly Park Dam and Reservoir, Camp Creek Diversification Dam and Tunnel, and conduits and canals as authorized under the American River Act.

titles.title: To provide for the sale by the Secretary of the Interior of the Sly Park Unit of the Central Valley Project to the El Dorado Irrigation District, Placerville, El Dorado County, California.
